about_the_game:
Survive an onslaught of enemies as you protect your citadel with an arcane arsenal. Build outward to encompass powerful runespires to modulate your weaponry. Kill powerful rune goblins and survive the battle to gain precious runes and upgrade your power. Epic hordes assault your base, wield the power of the runestones to push them back.

Siegecaster is an active skill-based siege defense game that requires players to strategically build out their bases to gain powerful upgrades and fend off the epic hordes.

Each level has multiple base locations, allowing players to choose their own strategy to complete the fight. Plan your buildout carefully, as the onslaught from enemies never stops. 

Encircle mighty runespires to increase the power of your turrets with upgradeable runes. Choose your rune inventory wisely based on your unique playstyle. 

The horde is oppressive and unyielding. To have a fighting chance, you will need to power up your arsenal. 

Death is almost certain. For those who can survive, more powerful enemies and new biomes await. 

Key Features: 

  • Hordes of Enemies: A variety of enemies abound. Use the right weapon for the job. Face intimidating forces and attempt to overcome the onslaught. 

  • Modular Rune Upgrades: Each rune can be inserted into any weapon in any combination. Granting a variety of upgrades to the Siegecaster’s arsenal. 

  • Build and Encircle Mechanics: Be tactical and build out based on wall piece designs.

  • Progressive Rune Collection: Earn, upgrade and enhance their inventory of runes between missions leveling up their power.

  • Unique Levels: Each level has multiple starting locations and occurs across several fantastical biomes within the Siegecaseter universe.

  • Summon Wizard Abilities: Cast various wizard abilities, customize with the right spell for you. 

  • Great on Steam Deck: The game has been optimized for gameplay on Steam Deck Devices, with full controller support.

  • Original Soundtrack: Composed by nervous_testpilot (Frozen Synapse, Fights in Tight Spaces, The Banished Vault) the battle comes to life.
